TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1215=Zanibon was founded in Padua in 1908 by Guglielmo Zanibon (1878-1966). It moved to Milan in 1992 and is currently incorporated as part of the Ricordi Group. According to the firm's website, its name is trademarked by the company Armelin Musica of Padua.}
textBeforeTable: Plate Numbers Luigi Boccherini: Edizione critica delle opere (1977-) Editions Zanibon is still active and by now has published over 7000 items. Zanibon was founded in Padua in 1908 by Guglielmo Zanibon (1878-1966). It moved to Milan in 1992 and is currently incorporated as part of the Ricordi Group. According to the firm's website, its name is trademarked by the company Armelin Musica of Padua.
